communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide records sufficient to show a current staff roster of all sworn employees with your agency.

Please include;
- first and last name of each employee with their corresponding;
- badge number
- employee identification number
- hire date
- rank or position
- assigned duty station/substation/precinct/location
- current salary

This request applies to ALL sworn Department employees, including those at substations.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Marcus Boyd

title: Puerto Rico FEMA Catastrophic Hurricane Plan (FEMA Region 2)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Here is a link to a previously filed and completed FOIA request about Puerto Rico's FEMA Catastrophic Disaster Plan: https://www.muckrock.com/foi/united-states-of-america-10/puerto-rico-fema-catastrophic-hurricane-plan-45627/

Therefore, I request the following records:

1) The most recent Catastrophic Hurricane Plan, often called a "hurricane annex," for Puerto Rico produced by FEMA. To aid in your search, a version of this document published in 2014 had the title "FEMA Region II Hurricane Annex for Puerto Rico and US Virgin Islands." The document can be found here: https://www.dhs.gov/sites/default/files/publications/FEMA%20Region%20II%20Hurricane%20Annex%20for%20Puerto%20Rico%20and%20US%20Virgin%20Islands-%20Oc....pdf

Keywords: "Hurricane Annex" and "FEMA Region II"

This request is for all records produced from January 1, 2018 to the date this request is processed. Please send records to me on a rolling basis. Please omit any duplicate records.

This request is not being made for commercial purposes. Documents procured from this request will be used in the course of reporting about Puerto Rico's catastrophe preparedness for Heavy Weather, an independent newsletter about Puerto Rico: heavyweather.ghost.io

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco
